NK040(thi)009:1: // khros ma nag mo'i dbang sdud bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)009:2: bla ma yum chen mkha' 'gro la //
NK040(thi)009:3: sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)009:4: 'gro rnams thar pa thob bya'i phyir //
NK040(thi)009:5: lus kyi mchod sbyin 'dir brjod bya //
NK040(thi)009:6: rang tha mal du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de /
NK040(thi)009:7: yi ge h'u mthing nag gi rnam par spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i bu ga nas thon /
NK040(thi)009:8: gnas 'gyur gyis khros ma nag mo /
NK040(thi)009:10: zhal gdangs ba mche ba gtsig pa /
NK040(thi)009:12: g.yas nyi ma'i spyan ni dmar kyi li li /
NK040(thi)009:13: g.yon zla ba'i spyan ni ngang sga ra ra /
NK040(thi)009:14: dbus kyi spyan la nyi zla skar gsum ga'u dmar nag tu 'khrug pa /
NK040(thi)009:15: ral pa zar bu gyen du zings pa /
NK040(thi)009:16: phag zhal nag po spyi gtsug tu thon pa /
NK040(thi)009:17: ngur ba'i sgras khams gsum ma lus dbang du bsdud pa /
NK040(thi)009:18: ze ba dmar po me ltar 'bar ba /
NK040(thi)009:19: mi mgo skam po lngas dbu la rgyan pa /
NK040(thi)009:20: rlon pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi do shal byas pa /
NK040(thi)009:21: zhabs g.yas pa g.yon pa'i bla la gtad pa /
NK040(thi)009:22: phyi rting gi b+ha ga la bcar ba /
NK040(thi)009:23: rked pa sgeg pa nu ma 'bur ba /
NK040(thi)009:24: bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa /
NK040(thi)009:25: gru mo na kha t+w+aam kha 'dzin pa /
NK040(thi)009:26: zhabs g.yon pa 'gying stabs kyi tshul du mar brkyang pas /
NK040(thi)009:27: dmyal ba na rag gi sgo bzhi non pa /
NK040(thi)009:28: dbu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gnas su sleb pa /
NK040(thi)009:29: sku stod yan chad nam mkha' la khyab pas /
NK040(thi)009:30: lha khams thams cad dbang du bsdud pa /
NK040(thi)009:31: sku smad man chad sa gzhi la khyab pa /
NK040(thi)009:32: klu khams thams cad dbang du bsdud pa /
NK040(thi)009:33: sked pa rdo rje sprug pas bar snang la khyab pa /
NK040(thi)009:34: snang srid lha 'dre dregs pa can thams cad dbang du bsdud pa /
NK040(thi)009:35: sku la khrag gi thig le /
NK040(thi)009:41: rus pa dang rin po che'i rgyan drug gis brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)009:42: phyag g.yas pas mi lpags gis g.yang gzhi khrag dmar rtsa re ba /
NK040(thi)009:43: glad la g.yug cing sa la gdab pas /
NK040(thi)009:44: khams gsum dbang du bsdud pa /
NK040(thi)009:45: g.yon pas mi rkang gling bu rtser rtser 'bud pa /
NK040(thi)009:46: srid gsum zil gyis non pa /
NK040(thi)009:47: de'i spyi gtsug na ma dbang bsdud kyi khros ma nag mo la /
NK040(thi)009:48: dbang bsdud kyi mkha' 'gro ma 'bum gyis bskor bar gyur /
NK040(thi)009:49: phatah ma mi mngon nam mkha'i dbyings rum na //
NK040(thi)009:50: spyi gtsug pad zla'i gdan steng na //
NK040(thi)009:51: mi min ye shes mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)009:52: ma cig lab sgron drag mo'i zhal //
NK040(thi)009:53: gsol ba 'debs so byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)009:54: sku mdog mthing nag 'jig pa la //
NK040(thi)009:55: spyan gsum spyan rtsa dmar la 'khrug /
NK040(thi)009:56: dbu skra dmar ser zi ra khol //
NK040(thi)009:57: rus pa'i rgyan gyis rab tu mdzes //
NK040(thi)009:58: spyi gtsug bka' brgyud bla ma bzhugs //
NK040(thi)009:59: bla ma'i byin brlabs sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)009:60: g.yas su dpa' bo'i ngar dang bcas //
NK040(thi)009:61: dpa' bos bro brdung khrigs se khrig /
NK040(thi)009:62: g.yon der dpa' mos mdangs dang ldan //
NK040(thi)009:63: dpa' mos gar byed khyugs se khyug /
NK040(thi)009:65: phyag g.yas mi lpag g.yang gzhi 'phyar //
NK040(thi)009:66: g.yon pas mi rkang gling bu 'bud //
NK040(thi)009:67: mi lpag g.yug la gling bu bus //
NK040(thi)009:68: g.yug pas lha 'dre dbang du bsdud //
NK040(thi)009:69: g.yug pas byad ma dbang du bsdud //
NK040(thi)009:70: steng gdon lha dang drang srong bsdus //
NK040(thi)009:71: 'og gdon klu dang sa bdag bsdus //
NK040(thi)009:72: bar gdon lha srin sde brgyad bsdus //
NK040(thi)009:73: lha dang lha min dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)009:74: mi dang mi min dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)009:75: dbang bsdud mkha' 'gro mthu ma chung //
NK040(thi)009:76: mi lpags g.yang bzhi rtsal ma zhan //
NK040(thi)009:77: mi rkang gling bu ngar ma chung //
NK040(thi)009:78: rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro bang ma bul //
NK040(thi)009:79: srid pa'i rtse man chad dang //
NK040(thi)009:80: na rag dmyal ba yan chad du //
NK040(thi)009:81: nam mkha'i sprin tshogs bzhin du bsdus la shog /
NK040(thi)009:82: bar snang char pa bzhin du bob pa shog /
NK040(thi)009:83: sa gzhi rlung dmar bzhin du 'tshubs la shog /
NK040(thi)009:84: mchod pa rgya chen 'di na che //
NK040(thi)009:85: bza' ba sha ni 'di na che //
NK040(thi)009:86: btung ba'i khrag gi 'di na che //
NK040(thi)009:87: mur ba'i lha ba 'di na snum //
NK040(thi)009:88: gon pa'i lpags pa 'di na dro //
NK040(thi)009:89: phatah spyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bka' yi lha ma srin sde brgyad /
NK040(thi)009:90: sgos lho rgyal 'dzam gling 'di'i bka'i lha ma srin sde brgyad /
NK040(thi)009:91: yang sgos gnyan sa 'di'i stod smad bar gsum la gnas pa'i steng gi lha /
NK040(thi)009:92: 'og gi klu bar gyi gnyan thams cad bdag khros
NK040(thi)009:93: ma nag mo'i bka' nyan dang gsung sdod kyi tshul
NK040(thi)009:98: sa rgyus med pa zil gnon 'phen pa /
NK040(thi)009:100: rang nyid khros ma nag mo'i thugs ka nas /
NK040(thi)009:103: gnam lcags rdo rje rtse dgu pa 'phros pas sa
NK040(thi)009:104: phyogs der phog pa tsam gyis tsam gzhong gsig pa
NK040(thi)009:107: rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las dpa' bo dpa' mo'i gur khang /
NK040(thi)009:108: de'i rgyab rdo rje'i rwa gur /
NK040(thi)009:109: de'i rgyab du mi nag lag sbrel gyi gur khang /
NK040(thi)009:110: de'i rgyab tu mun nag gi gur khang sgom /
NK040(thi)009:111: der gnas pa'i lha 'dre thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgom /
NK040(thi)009:112: dbang bsdud 'og na yod ltar byas nas rkang dung lan gsum 'bud nas /
NK040(thi)009:115: rang nyid dpa' bo go barje ba'i tshul gyis ma
NK040(thi)009:116: cig lab sgron sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag
NK040(thi)009:117: gnyis spyan gsum mche ba bzhi gtsig pa /
NK040(thi)009:119: g.yon na lcags kyu bsnam pa gcig tu gyur par bsam la ngag tu /
NK040(thi)009:123: lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)009:125: smin mtshams ba spu'i gseb nas khro chung rang 'dra ba grangs med par spros pas /
NK040(thi)009:126: lha 'dre thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang med de /
NK040(thi)009:127: rang la phyag 'tshal zhing bka' nyan gsung sdod byed par bsgom /
NK040(thi)009:128: khro chung rnams kyang snga mo'i lab sgron dang 'chab pa'i gur cig bsgom mo //
